member.name: T:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator
member.summary: 适用于高德地图的定位接口 封装了 Geolocator

member.name: M:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.GetGeopositionAsync
member.summary: Initializes an asynchronous operation to retrieve the location of the user's computer.
member.returns: Provides methods for starting the asynchronous request for location data and handling its completion.

member.name: M:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.GetGeopositionAsync(System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Initializes an asynchronous operation to retrieve the location of the user's computer.

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.DesiredAccuracy
member.summary: The accuracy level at which the Geolocator provides location updates.

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.LocationStatus
member.summary: The status that indicates the ability of the Geolocator to provide location updates.

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.MovementThreshold
member.summary: Gets the distance of movement, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last PositionChanged event, that is required for the Geolocator to raise a PositionChanged event.

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.ReportInterval
member.summary: The requested minimum time interval between location updates, in milliseconds. If your application requires updates infrequently, set this value so that the location provider can conserve power by calculating location only when needed.

member.name: E:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.PositionChanged
member.summary: Raised when the location is updated.

member.name: E:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.AGeolocator.StatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the ability of the Geolocator to provide updated location changes.

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.CoordSystem.CoordinateReferenceSystem.CentralMeridian
member.summary: 中央经线，该参数为构造地图投影的基础。

member.name: P:Com.AMap.Maps.Api.CoordSystem.CoordinateReferenceSystem.UnitAuthority
member.summary: The authority body that defines the unit of measurement i.e. European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG). For DeepEarth.Client.MapControl the unit of measurement is usually degrees and the authority for the datum the map uses, WGS 1984 is EPSG:4326 该参数定义了诸如EPSG等的测量单位。对于DeepEarth.Client.MapControl来说，单位通常为度，地图使用的WGS1985水准面的授权为EPSG：4326。

member.summary: CoordinateReferenceSystem 生产工厂 生产默认标准投影
